    Conference flow

    less than 1 minute read

    Application domain includes AppClient and AppServer.
    PlanetKit and LINE Planet Cloud belong to LINE Planet domain.

    Join

    LINE Planet conference join flow can be shown:

    To join a room ,
    group call participants must know room id before joining the room.

    Request Peer Video

    Mixed audio will be automatically streamed when a participant joins.
    However video stream requires to call requestPeerVideo() API with the proper user id and service id.

    Depends on OS UI Framework You may need to additional API call to render a peer video stream. Please check PlanetKit API specifications.

    Leave

    When a participant leaves, the flow can be shown:

    Green color (conferenceJoin, requestPeerVideo, leave, evtJoined ,evtUpdated and evtLeft) presents client APIs that are exported by PlanetKit SDK. Red color (GCallEvent) presents a server call back API that is called by a LINE Planet Cloud server.

    History

    2020-11-24 Change client API

    • addMember() â€“> requestPeerVideo()

    2020-08-18 the first version
